titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation against wast and excesse in apparell
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at His Majesties court at Oxford,the ninth day of June, in the nineteenth yeare of his raigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
